title: Drawing, "A Thatch Roof and a Tiled Roof with Tree Tops in a Mountainous Landscape near Chimborazo, Ambato, Ecuador", June 17, 1857
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center right:  Lugt 457 e; and at center left:  Lugt 457 d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Sanci Trees / C H Ambato / June 17th / 57; and again at bottom right:  South America
description: Horizontal view containing the roofs of two houses and the tops of trees at center with a mountainous landscape in the rear with the back of a man, bust of a man wearing a hate and tops of trees across the lower left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Thatch Roof and a Tiled Roof with Tree Tops in a Mountainous Landscape near Chimborazo, Ambato, Ecuador", June 17, 1857.
June 17, 1857. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-237.
